DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine distribution lung fluid status report IMED-4 system patient present emergency department urgent care facility shortness breath .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Shortness breath prominent present symptom Age great ≥ 45 Willingness , ability , commitment participate study EXCLUSION CRITERIA Patients active implantable medical device Patients pregnant lactate Patients tattoos nonintact skin directly electrode position Patients past allergic reaction medical grade adhesive Patients dialysis dependent Patients lung lobectomy Patients shortness breath presentation due obvious non HF cause acute chest trauma Patients receive nitrate ( sublingual , topical IV ) , diuretic vasopressor ≥ 1 hour prior IMED4 Recording Patients decline back photograph IMED4 device position Patients receive invasive noninvasive positive airway pressure ( PAP ) ventilation prior follow presentation ED ( Self presentation admission via EMS ) . Severe comorbidity poor general physical/mental health , opinion Investigator , allow subject good study candidate ( i.e . disease process , mental capacity , substance abuse , incarceration , shorten life expectancy , etc . )
